body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Russell Williams, and I'm an agent at Auto Solutions - your one-stop solution for all car-related queries. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Betty Anderson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Betty. Could you provide me with your phone number so that we can reach out to you in case we need more information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five two three four one zero nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Betty. And may I also have your email address to update you on the progress of the pricing issue you're facing?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Betty. We'll look into the pricing matter and get back to you as soon as possible. Is there anything else you'd like to share with us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Betty. Thank you for reaching out to us and sharing your concerns. We'll do our best to resolve the pricing issue promptly. Have a great day!
